skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep meditation guided
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Meditation Guided is the Alexa skill that offers guided sessions to help you relax and peacefully drift into sleep. With over 10 unique sessions, each lasting 10 minutes, and a variety of soothing voices and calming background sounds, this skill is designed to prepare your body and mind for restful, restorative sleep.

Unlock Pro Features to enjoy:

• Guided sessions with professional, calming voices
• A selection of background sounds ideal for deep relaxation
• Unlimited access with no restrictions
• Regularly updated sleep-enhancing programs
• Full access to all session lengths

We value your feedback to help us improve and provide the best sleep and relaxation experience.

Enjoy your journey to peaceful sleep!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
